creditline: Gift of Bill and Roberta Stein
description: seven prints of the same single butterfly image in different colors; image is square with a butterfly with horizontal lines in background; on white paper with deckle edge; only print (a) is signed and numbered and it is on a larger sheet than the other prints in the set
markings: print a, BL below image, graphite: ff/zz; BLC, graphite: ff/zz; verso BC, graphite: ff/zz; verso BRC, graphite: 151981-39 / Ham 86-617 / Yoz040-86
signed: print a, BR, below image, graphite: hamaguchi
title: Blue Butterfly Seven States
